document.docAuthor: Franco, José Carlos, Russo, Agatino & Marotta, Salvatore
document.masterDocTitle: An annotated checklist of scale insects (Hemiptera: Coccoidea) of Portugal, including Madeira and Azores Archipelagos

References: CAB ( 1966 a),
Borges et al . ( 2008 )
,
Danzig & Watson ( 2010 )
.

Comments: the presence of
A. destructor
in Madeira reported by CAB ( 1966 a) was based on Mercet’s list of parasitoids emerged from scale insects collected in Madeira, South Africa and Italian Somaliland (
Mercet, 1927
). However, the record of
A. destructor
is only related to the Italian Somaliland and not to Madeira. The species was not included in the review on the coccoids of Madeira by
Vieira et al . ( 1983 )
. Nevertheless, this species was recently identified on
Archontophoenix cunninghamiana
( Arecaceae ) by António Miguel Franquinho Aguiar (personal communication, 2008 ), at Caniço de Baixo, Santa Cruz, and included in the arthropod list published by
Borges et al. ( 2008 )
.

bibRefCitation.author: Lindinger
